**FIX THE RAW URL; THE LINTER IS SCREAMING FOR A REASON.**

Leaving a naked URL in Line 101 violates MD034 and makes the doc look like it was thrown together during a power outage. Wrap it in proper Markdown so the pipeline stops whining. Based on static analysis.
